Title: The Long Goodbye
Plot: Lifelong friends Dawson, Joey and Pacey put past grudges behind them in the wake of the tragic death of one of their fathers. Along with Jack, Jen and Grams, each tries to find the words and actions to comfort their friend.
GuestStars: John Wesley Shipp, Jodi Thelan, Benjamin Shelfer, Terrence Currier, Lia C. Long, Michael J. Long
